= Differences =
  ==Handle basically five different type of differences:==
  === 1. Folder created.===
  === 2. Folder deleted.===
  === 3. File created.===
  === 4. File deleted.===
 === 5. File modified.===
-----
== Attributes==
 ==== private List`<`FolderMeta`>` deletedFolderDifference =new List`<`FolderMeta`>`();====
 Contains differences of type folder deleted.
 ==== private List`<`FolderMeta`>` newFolderDifference = new List`<`FolderMeta`>`();====
 Contains differences of type folder created.
 ==== private List`<`FileMeta`>` deletedFileDifference = new List`<`FileMeta`>`();====
 Contains differences of type file deleted.
 ==== private List`<`FileMeta`>` newFileDifference = new List`<`FileMeta`>`();====
 Contains differences of type file created.
 ==== private List`<`FileMeta`>` modifiedFileDifference = new List<FileMeta`>`();====
 Contains differences of type file modified.
